alert.note: Alert for Kern (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 3:11PM PDT until August 21 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL KERN COUNTY... At 310 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McKittrick, or 37 miles west of Bakersfield, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McKittrick and Derby Acres. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large amounts of accumulating hail are possible. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
